quote: I actually did 16.7 miles because I went the wrong way, up a rath...

It's that rare event - a ride that's genuinely suitable for the average rider on a gravel bike without segueing too far into MTB territory. Always a great ride. The Haldon Heroic Medio was a thoroughly enjoyable and well-organised event that delivered everything you'd want from a spring gravel ride.
Designed for gravel bikes, the event also welcomes CX bikes, mountain bikes, and even e-bikes.
It showcases the best gravel trails & bridleways in the Haldon Forest Area, Devon, UK
